evaluation

Class EvaluationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • evaluation.EvaluationManager

  • public class EvaluationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the information of a run(1 or more game rounds) and the round objects, which are saving all information from one game.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • EvaluationManager

        public EvaluationManager(int rounds,
                         java.lang.String gameName,
                         Player playerRed,
                         Player playerWhite)
        After starting a run, the object is initialized with all important parameters that are relevant for the evaluation. And a new array of Rounds object with the length of game in this run is created.

        Parameters:
        rounds - An Integer that represents the number of games that will be played in this run.
        gameName - The give name for the run.
        playerRed - The Player to which the red pieces were assigned.
        playerWhite - The Player to which the white pieces were assigned.

    • Method Detail

      • createRound

        public void createRound(int currentRound)
        Creates a new Round object at a distinct spot in the rounds array.

        Parameters:
        currentRound - An Integer that represents a spot in an array. It stands for the certain round in a run.

      • getRound

        public Round getRound(int currentRound)
        Return a round object for the round array at a certain spot.

        Parameters:
        currentRound - An Integer that represents a spot in an array. It stands for the certain round in a run.
        Returns:
        A object from the type rounds.

      • runEvaluation

        public void runEvaluation()
        In this method all information from every round is gathered and evaluatated. Then two static methods in FileUtitlies are called which are creating the .txt Files.

      • getRunName

        public java.lang.String getRunName()
        Returns:
        A string that represents the name of the run.
